This is an online store. The project is divided into three inner and one external zone:

  • Zone for admin:

    • management by dealers
    • management by clients
    • management by orders

  • Zone for customer:

    • view and search for products
    • goods management in the shopping cart
    • make order

  • Zone for dealer:

    • management by companies
    • management by categories
    • management by products
    • management by orders

  • External zone:

    • dealers and customers registration
    • user authentication
    • possibility to change password
    • project information

Users for zone:

  • admin login: "Admin", password "Admin"
  • customer login: "Dealer", password "Dealer"
  • dealer login: "Customer", password "Customer"

Code for reset password is "123".
